description: TSCHYBRID is the Hybrid Crypto exchange which will solve the liquidity problem of trx tokens by making them tradable with BTC, ETH, TRX,TSC & USDT. Fees are lowered by using its native token TSCHYBRID.TronSecureHybrid is the new TRC20 Token of TronSecure TSC.
top_6_features: Consensus via Delegate Proof of Stake (Fast Paxos)
High bandwidth, averaging 2000 Transactions per Second
Limited TRX price control via centralized burn or minting
